assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: adish Co., Ltd. provides growth and adoption support solutions in Japan and internationally. It offers growth support services for startups comprising CS Studio that provides customer success, consultation, and office-based/temporary help services; SOCIAL APP SUPPORT that provides support and agency services; Start-up Growth Support to deal with issues, such as responding to a surge in inquiries, setting communication preferences, and troubleshooting; Data Crab that provides data generating services; and INTERNET MONITORING that provides monitoring services for appropriate postings. The company also offers Adoption Support Services to business companies and educational institutions, including School Guardian, which provides support for personal information leakage on the internet and cyber bullying; Pazu for in-house measurement against flaming and social media literacy; hitobo for streamlining business operations with AL chatbot; matte, an AI alert function; and FrontSupport, an operational service for social media fan community. adish Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
